EmailTemplate.name: OOO July 29 Dealers
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for reaching out to YETI! {!Case.Thread_Id}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for reaching out to YETI! The YETI team is out field testing some YETI Coolers and will return Monday, August 1st. Your email is important to us and we will respond as soon as we're back.
Thanks,
Account Management Team 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeticoolers.com yeticoolers.com
{!Case.Thread_Id}
